content.question: Autonomic Nervous Part A Autonomic Nervous Part B Pupils are dilated Pupils contract Heartbeat Accelerates Heartbeat slows Digestion Stops Digestion continues Relaxes bladder Bladder Contracts Which branch of the autonomic nervous system is described by the functions listed in Part B of the table?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
